data.title: So fun!!
data.text: I joined 12 of my family members for this fun time. Our driver Jeff, was great, taking pictures and videos for us. The 2 hours flew by. I highly recommend for everyone. A little bit of a workout, but easy enough for anyone to do.

data.title: A grand adventure
data.text: My friend's and I had a great time!The driver was awesome and joked around with us! I highly suggest it for any group that wants to have a drink and see downtown Indy.

data.title: Birthday Bash
data.text: Decided to do this with a bunch of friends and it was such a blast! Donovan was our driver and couldn't of been better. Everyone didn't want the ride to end and should have been prepared for a sore butt!

data.title: Team Awesome
data.text: Andrew E. was a stellar host and bartender. He was professional and fun! Handle Bar is a unique experience and worth every penny. A memorable 40th birthday for my love!

data.title: Real Women Ride
data.text:
Hello Everyone,
Hear me when I say that 15 of my lady friends and myself truly, truly enjoyed ourselves during our tour of Downtown Detroit courtesy of The Handlebar Detroit. Our driver Elizabeth was awesome! She's a tiny little thing, but she handled her buisness. 👌I hear that a chance to vote on whether or not The Handlebar Detroit should be licensed to sell/serve alcoholic beverages is in the very near future. Well HBD you guys have our 16 votes!! You guys are awesome at what you do and show tons of responsibility. 
We plan to ride with you again next summer.
Best Wishes,
Alisa T of Real Women Ride
❤💛💚❤💛💚❤💛💚❤💛💚

data.title: Wonderful birthday celebration!
data.text:
This is my 2nd Handlebar experience and it was excellent!  Donovan was a fun and friendly driver that helped us plan route and stops.  This was a great way to help my friends get to know each other better!

The operation is professional, safety-oriented, on-time, and so much fun!!!  It's a great way to see downtown and try some of the breweries/taps (or other places) that you have heard about, but never dropped in.

It's also a great entertainment value!!!  I encourage you to book a ride!

data.title: Adult fun!
data.text: So much fun! Can't wait to do it again! Our out of town guests loved it. Great way to entertain at a reasonable cost.

data.title: awesome wedding gift
data.text: we had a great time!  The trip started a little rainy but we stayed mostly dry.  It was a breeze to book and the tour guide was great.  Would highly recommend.

data.title: Pedaling just for fun
data.text: My group has done the handlebar for the last three years.  We absolutely love it.  We bring our food, music,  beer and wine and pedal away. It is a great way to spend two hours with friends. If you have not tried it yet, you are truly missing a fun time.

data.title: This was our second Handle Bar experience!
data.text:
I didn't know it could get any better. Our driver "Chris" has been adopted by my family.
This is a great team building, bonding and over all enjoyable event.
The weather was amazing and we will do it again next year.
My parents (83 and 74) joined us this year and plan on doing it every year!

data.title: Awesome! Will totally do it again!
data.text: Great company. Great guide. Attracts really fun customers. Didn't know what to expect. Enjoyed every minute. Harder than I thought it would be; it is a bike.

data.title: Peddling through DT Indy
data.text: To celebrate my 60th birthday, my wife planned a fun night on the Handle Bar.   Jason our driver was great and fun.  We peddled through the hip areas of Indy. Even though we have lived here most of our lives, I noted some restaurants and bars I had net heard of.  We had our own "beverages" and stopped at the St. Joseph's Brewery and Kilroy's.  You do need pedal power, but it was a blast!!!  Highly recommended!!

data.title: You will be peddling z
data.text:
We had an excellent driver,  (Donovan), who took us to St. Joseph brewery and 5 Irish brothers.

The circle was closed due to the German festival but we get down Mass ave.

Had a ton of fun but my butt still hurts from peddling on the somewhat uncomfortable seats. 

You will be peddling and I'm kind of older guy so it won't be the easiest thing you will on the day you do the Handlebar.

All in all I went with a great group of folks, peddled my butt off but had a great time.

data.title: The ultimate pedal experience!
data.text:
Corey was a wonderful host/driver! I think he had just as much fun as our group. 
It was great to be able to see the city this way and be able to stop off at a couple locations even. 
We did this as part of a bachelorette party and it was perfect! Everyone enjoyed it so much.

data.title: Pedal Party
data.text: A group of us went down to see Indianapolis, we booked The Handlebar due to their incredible customer service via email leading up to our trip.  They made booking easy and clear to understand.  Upon their suggestion we arrived 20 mins early, but seriously had to wait till exactly our time before we even saw the bike we were to pedal.  Not a problem, just think 10 mins early would have been plenty.  Anyway, our driver was great, Captain Donovan.  He made for a great pedal around the town, and truly accommodated our whole group.  We had alot of fun and wish we had more then 2 hours.  Good job Handlebar!

data.title: Best Birthday Celebration Ever!
data.text: We were celebrating my daughter's 21st birthday.  Our driver was great, super friendly, and helpful!  I would recommend the handlebar to anyone wanting a great evening of fun and laughter!

data.title: had the best time ever!!!!!
data.text: they showed us a great time :) Curtis was our guide and made the trip even better!!!! We will definitely go with this company again!

data.title: Great time - Highly recommend!!
data.text: A lot of fun; the two hours go by VERY quickly!!!  Great way to see different parts of downtown Indianapolis!

data.title: a Must!!
data.text: If you are exploring downtown Indianapolis, this spot has to be a part of our itinerary. Fun environment. Good for family oriented visit as well but will probably have more fun with friends in my opinion. Good fun experience for both locals and visitors alike.

data.title: Fun Fun Fun
data.text:
What do you do when your sorority sisters come to town? Take them on The Handle Bar.  We were able to talk to each other, sing, and take advantage of libations while seeing our beautiful city.  They all left saying they want to come back and spend another weekend in downtown Indy.

Our driver Cory was great!  He didn't seem to mind hosting a loud bunch of 50 year olds!
